description: This file defines React functional components for various UI states including loading, empty, and error states, with customizable content and actions.

methods.name: LoadingState({ title = "Loading…", message = "Fetching data. Please wait.", inline = false })
methods.description: Renders a loading indicator with a title and message, optionally inline.

methods.name: EmptyState({ title = "Nothing here yet", message = "Try adjusting filters or refreshing.", actionLabel, onAction, inline = false, })
methods.description: Displays a no-data available state with optional action button.

methods.name: ErrorState({ title = "Something went wrong", message = "We couldn’t load the requested data.", details, actionLabel = "Retry", onAction, inline = false, })
methods.description: Shows an error message with optional details and retry action.
